text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump What happens in fall when second wave of #Coronavirus hits? @realdonaldtrump & 23 @senateGOP are arrogant enough to think they will get a second bite at the apple!
 
85,000+ #Americans died! Start packing @GOP!🧳

171 Days until #OperationOrangeCrush🍊
#VoteBlueNoMatterWho2020
